title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin out, Joy Taylor steps in to react to Nikola Jokic winning the NBA's MVP and why he had a great season, but another player might have been more deserving. She discusses James Harden's big bounce back performance in game 4 against the Heat but explains why this could be short lived. She also believes the physical nature of this year's NBA playoffs has been a good thing. Plus, NFL reporter Josina Anderson joins the show to provide insight on what the Browns plan to do with Baker Mayfield as the trade market has dried up.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
